title: Year in Review knows me so well
body:
That the first thing it shows me is a reminder why i stopped playing ranked for this season.

https://image.prntscr.com/image/lA1yLopCQJioGR5jEXCcnA.png

Because you fuckwits put dynamic queue ranks as solo/duo ranks.

So all the people who got boosted in dynamic queue were ready to ruin all the games.

Thanks for the reminder riot.

replies.body: yeah but werent all the boosted monkeys demoted after a couple of months

It's a lot harder to get demoted then you would think.

Even trash players that feed still win probably around 30% of their games because their team carries the fuck out of them.

And for example someone who was bronze that got carried into diamond, would take several seasons to actually demote back down to where they belong.
